Class DTWHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.enseeiht.danck.voice_analyzer.DTWHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DTWHelperDefault

    public abstract class DTWHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A tool for computing DTW on Fields.
    Author:
    Anaël Megna, Kilian Boulhaïs, Cyrius Nugier

    • Method Detail

      • getDtwHelper

        public static DTWHelper getDtwHelper()
        Returns a clone of the injected DTWHelper. Uses a default one if none has been injected.
        Returns:
        a new DTWHelper instance

      • setDtwHelper

        public static void setDtwHelper(DTWHelper dtwHelper)
        Injects the new DTWHelper definition.
        Parameters:
        dtwHelper - the new DTWHelper definition (passed as instance)

      • getDtwHelper

        public static DTWHelper getDtwHelper(boolean clone)
        Returns either a clone of the injected DTWHelper, or the DTWHelper itself. Uses a default one if none has been injected.
        Parameters:
        clone - true if the returned DTWHelper has to be a clone
        Returns:
        either a new DTWHelper instance, or the original one

      • DTWDistance

        public abstract float DTWDistance(Field unknownField,
                                  Field knownField)
        Computes the distance between two Fields with a DTW algorithm.
        Parameters:
        unknownField - the unknown Field we are trying to identify
        knownField - the known Fields, usually coming from the database
        Returns:
        the distance between the two Fields
